Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Cascade Gardens in Cairns (Cairns), you'll be minutes from Muddy's Playground and Center of Contemporary Arts. This family-friendly condo is within close proximity of Jute Theatre and Kick Contemporary Arts.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 44 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and minibars, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a spa tub.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, dry cleaning/laundry services, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Cascade Gardens in Cairns (Cairns), you'll be minutes from Muddy's Playground and Center of Contemporary Arts. This family-friendly condo is within close proximity of Jute Theatre and Kick Contemporary Arts.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Muddy's Playground - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Center of Contemporary Arts - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Jute Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Kick Contemporary Arts - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Cairns Civic Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Cairns Esplanade - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Cairns Base Hospital - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Cairns Night Markets - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
The Cultural Place - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Cairns Regional Gallery - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Esplanade Lagoon - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Cairns Esplanade Charles Street Parkland - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Cairns Central Shopping Centre - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
ZOO To You HQ Wildlife Discovery Centre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Reef Hotel Casino - 1 km / 0.6 mi

The preferred airport for Cascade Gardens is Cairns, QLD (CNS-Cairns Intl.) - 4.9 km / 3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
